tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE CustomerInquiries (
  inquiry_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  customer_name VARCHAR(50),
  inquiry_text TEXT,
  inquiry_timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE CustomerInquiries (
  inquiry_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  customer_id INT,
  inquiry_text TEXT,
  inquiry_date TIMESTAMP,
  inquiry_status VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE InquiryAnalysis (
    analysis_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    inquiry_id INT,
    topic_id INT,
    analysis_result TEXT,
    analysis_date TIMESTAMP
);
